description: Firefly AB engages in the supply of spark detection, fire, and dust explosion protection systems. The company is headquartered in Stockholm, Stockholm and currently employs 57 full-time employees. The company went IPO on 2000-06-26. The Company’s activities are structured into two principal business areas: Industrial Applications and Infra systems (Sentio). The Industrial applications area includes customized fire prevention systems, which monitor industrial processes in such industries as woodworking, tissue, food, bioenergy, tobacco and recycling, among others. The firm's solutions include Quick Suppression System, Spark Detection System and a range of extinguishing methods. The Infrastructure systems business area includes fire monitoring of tunnels, including subway, train, road and cable tunnels, by means of multiple gas detection (MGD) or electronic nose. The firm offers its solutions worldwide.
name: Firefly AB
